Package fr.islandswars.api.cmd.lang

Annotation Type Command

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(TYPE)
public @interface Command

    A slicy modified command

    Author:

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      java.lang.String[] aliases  
      java.lang.String description  
      java.lang.String label  

    • Element Detail

      • aliases

        java.lang.String[] aliases
        Returns:
        this specific command aliases
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the given alias is already registered
        Default:
        {}

      • description

        java.lang.String description
        Returns:
        this command description shown in help message
        Default:
        ""

      • label

        java.lang.String label
        Returns:
        the main command label
        Default:
        ""
